skills.name: Energy Bolt
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60%
[Decrease DEF]
debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on
[ATK]
Level: 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level: 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level: 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level: 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +20%

skills.name: Ancestral Spirits
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60%
[Decrease DEF]
debuff for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted. Places a 50%
[Increase ATK]
buff on all allies for 2 turns.

[ATK]
Level: 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
